mapper.update: CREATE TABLE team_apply_#{teamId} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, team_apply_date DATETIME NOT NULL, team_accept_status BIGINT NOT NULL, users_id BIGINT NOT NULL UNIQUE, team_id BIGINT NOT NULL );
mapper.select: SELECT ta.id as id, ta.team_accept_status as teamAcceptStatus, ta.users_id as userId, ta.team_id as teamId, u.name as name, u.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl, u.preferred_city as preferredCity, u.preferred_area as preferredArea FROM team_apply_#{teamId} ta JOIN users u ON ta.users_id = u.id WHERE team_accept_status = 0
SELECT id as id, team_apply_date as teamApplyDate, team_accept_status as teamAcceptStatus, users_id as userId, team_id as teamId FROM team_apply_#{teamId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_apply_#{teamId} (team_apply_date, team_accept_status, team_id, users_id) VALUES (now(), #{teamAcceptStatus}, #{teamId}, #{userId})
